alert.note: Alert for Jackson; Madison (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 01 at 10:15PM CST by NWS Huntsville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Jackson, northern Madison, southeastern Moore, southern Lincoln and western Franklin Counties through 1100 PM CST... At 1015 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Hazel Green, or near Meridianville, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Winchester, Fayetteville, Meridianville, Moores Mill, Hazel Green, Decherd, Estill Springs, Huntland, Tims Ford Lake and New Market. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 200 AM CST for north central and northeastern Alabama...and Middle Tennessee.
